replies.body:
Tank meta died and with it so did morde

Buffs will not help him when hes so reliant  on tanks ccing people

He needs a complete rework
Mord needs rework and VGU because his kit is just too easy to play around.
It's not time for buffs. It's not time for nerfs. Morde needs a VGU desperately.

Here he has a 49.3 winrate on Plat and +

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/platinum/plus/champions/


Anyway RIto is not going to buff a failed champ that has the record of being the most bugged champ in the game and that needs a VGU.
Well say what you want about morde his q is still the highest damaging move in the game
Well stop playing him ap then. I dont have any issues lol. Max w first playing him ad bruiser issue solved. Take grasp. And the only offesnse item you need is tri force
wait for hail of blades first. because tbh it looks fun.
